paragraph: The seventh and final book begins with Tom and his Death having a meeting at Malfoy .

They are beginning to plan out how to kidnap Harry during his evacuation from  Privet when he will be vulnerable . After `` borrowing '' Lucius 's wand in order to annihilate Harry once and for all -- Tom does so in a way that indicates Malfoy has no choice -- Tom kills Lucius 's captive , Charity -LRB- the Muggle Studies professor at Hogwarts -RRB- for teaching the subject and penning an article suggesting that Muggles should be treated as equals to pure-bloods .

It 's revealed during this meeting that Lucius has lost all of Tom 's respect and that the Dark Lord 's favour has shifted to Lucius 's sister-in-law Bellatrix , who has helped wreak chaos on the wizarding community ; Severus , who has enabled a clear field for his master 's rise to power with his murder of Albus at Hogwarts ; and Corban , who has enabled the Death to infiltrate the Ministry of Magic by means of the Imperius Curse .
Harry , meanwhile , is rummaging through his school trunk , sorting what he will need to take with him from what will be left behind .
While taking a break , he reads some articles about Albus .
One is sympathetic , the other critical .
In those obituaries , it is revealed that Albus ' father Percival supposedly hated Muggles and had attacked three Muggle boys , earning himself imprisonment in Azkaban , where he later died .

The other article is an interview by Rita , concerning a forthcoming biography of Albus entitled The Life and Lies of Albus , in which she hints that Albus was responsible for the death of his younger sister Ariana , and that he was , at one time , a wizarding supremacist with Gellert .
Harry is beginning to have regrets about not having asked Albus more about Albus 's past , but this is soon forgotten as Albus leaves Albus 's home that night .
Albus convinces Petunia , Vernon , and Dudley that they need to leave as well to avoid being captured by the Death .
Eventually Order of the Phoenix members Dedalus and Hestia Jones arrive to escort them to an undisclosed location .
Before leaving , Dudley admits that Albus cares about Harry and thanks him for saving Albus 's soul during the Dementor attack of  , and they shake hands .

Petunia burst into tears saying what a gentleman her son was , yet Hestia objected , saying he did n't really say , `` Thank you . '' but Harry tells her he was . Soon after , the Order of the Phoenix arrives with a plan to sneak Harry away from his house and avoid being captured by Tom . After initially opposing the plan , Harry acquiesces , seeing that he has no choice , and Ronald , Fred , and George , along with Hermione , Fleur , and Mundungus , take Polyjuice to make themselves look like Harry , in order to act as decoys for Tom . Each depart with a different Order member -LRB- Ronald with Nymphadora , Fred with his father Arthur , George with Remus , Hermione with Kingsley , Fleur with William , and Mundungus with Alastor -RRB- to protect them while riding on broomsticks or Thestrals , while Harry leaves with Rubeus in a side-car attached to Sirius 's motorcycle .
However , the plan goes badly wrong as the group is attacked by Death almost immediately after taking off , during which Hedwig is killed .

Harry fights off Death Eaters by firing curses and hexes at them , while Rubeus uses a number of gadgets the motorcycle is now equipped with a deployable solid brick wall , a net , and a dragon-fire booster . The Death discover the real Harry after he attempts to Disarm an Imperiused Stanley .
Moments later , Tom joins in the pursuit .
Rubeus leaps off the bike at another Death , and as Tom is about to kill Harry , the latter 's wand acts of its own accord and shoots a curse at Tom that breaks Lucius ' wand .
Tom attempts to strike again , but at that moment , Harry enters the protective charms of the Nymphadora ' home , and Tom and the Death Eaters are unable to follow him .
Harry finds that Rubeus has crashed in the garden and he is able to get out a simple `` Rubeus ? ''
before he too collapses .
When Harry wakes up , he meets Nymphadora ' parents , Andromeda , who have been taking care of him and Rubeus .
The couple show the two a Portkey , which transports them straight to the Burrow .
There , the casualties are counted : Hedwig was killed by a Killing Curse from a Death ; George 's ear was cursed off by Severus ; and Mad-Eye was killed by Tom himself .

Harry later has a vision regarding his escape , as a result of a connection between his and Tom 's minds , in which Tom questions Garrick , who crafted the wands , about why Harry 's wand acted as it did .
Garrick is unable to explain .

During their time at the Burrow , Harry , Ronald , and Hermione are kept busy with preparations for William and Fleur 's wedding , which Harry suspects is an attempt by Molly to stop their planning and delay their departure .
Nevertheless , they manage to get together and discuss their plans for completing the quest Albus left them , to find and destroy Tom 's Horcruxes .

The day before the wedding , Harry 's th birthday , he dreams of Tom searching for someone known as `` Mykew . '' For his birthday , he receives a number of gifts , the most useful being a new sneakoscope from Hermione .

Knowing that Harry was about to leave , Ginevra passionately kisses him as something to remember her by , which Ronald `` accidentally '' interrupts . Later in the day , Minister for Magic Rufus Scrimgeour , arrives at the Burrow to give Harry , Ronald , and Hermione ' personal effects , which had been bequeathed to them in his will :
The sword is withheld because , Rufus claimed , it was not Albus ' to give .
The three try to discover the purpose of the objects given to them , but are forced to give their attention to other matters , specifically William and Fleur 's wedding the following day .

Harry disguises himself as `` Ronald 's cousin '' Barny Weasley for the wedding to avoid causing an uproar . After the ceremony , while Ronald and Hermione are dancing , Harry speaks with Elphias and Ronald 's great aunt Muriel from whom he learns more less than savoury details from Albus ' past : Albus had had Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley and who Muriel believes was a squib .
Muriel also thinks that Albus killed Ariana . Elphias is shocked and will not believe Muriel and is brought to tears because of all of the lies .
During the wedding celebration , Kingsley 's Patronus arrives to warn the attendants that Tom has taken over the Ministry of Magic and Rufus has been killed .
Harry , Ronald , and Hermione flee the wedding , first arriving on Tottenham Court Road in Muggle .

There , they quickly make for a café to settle down and decide their next course of action . Though they think themselves safe for the moment , two Death suddenly locate them , almost immediately upon their arrival , and attack them . Harry , Ronald , and Hermione manage to defeat the Death , but thinking themselves in danger in public , flee to  Grimmauld Place , former Order headquarters , where they hide .

Although there was some debate whether Severus could get in , with reinforcement Death , but their fears were soon realised to be untrue as they reach the dilapidated house . The first morning there , Harry finds the name Regulus , the deceased younger brother of Sirius and a former Death , on a bedroom door . Harry realises that Regulus was the `` R.A.B. '' from the faux-Horcrux Harry found with Albus , and he , Hermione , and Ronald begin searching the house for the real one .
They soon surmise that the locket had indeed been in the house , at one time .
Unable to find it , they call upon Kreacher , the Black family 's house-elf .

Kreacher tells the trio that he had helped Tom place the real Horcrux in the cave . After Regulus learned of this , however , he had ordered Kreacher to return with him to the cave in order to substitute a fake locket for the real one , as Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Regulus-Potter-Sirius-Dursley would have been safer not involved in Tom 's affairs . Regulus was killed in the process while Kreacher escaped with the Horcrux locket . Kreacher also tells Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Regulus-Potter-Sirius-Dursley that Mundungus stole the locket , and Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Regulus-Potter-Sirius-Dursley send Kreacher to find him . While waiting for Kreacher , the trio are visited by Remus .

He explains more of the situation : the Voldemort-controlled Ministry and Death Eaters are searching for Harry , claiming that he had a part in Albus ' death , and now openly persecuting Muggle-born wizards and witches .
He then offers to join the trio in their quest , not wanting to remain with his wife , Nymphadora , who is pregnant with their child because he fears the child will be a werewolf like him .
Harry calls him a coward for abandoning his son , and Remus angrily storms off .
Later , Kreacher brings Mundungus back to  Grimmauld Place , but he has already given away the locket to Dolores as a bribe .
After a month of spying on the Ministry of Magic , the trio infiltrate it in order to retrieve the Horcrux from Dolores .
They ambush three employees and use Polyjuice to impersonate them with Hermione taking on the appearance of Mafalda Hopkirk , Ronald looking like Reginald , and Harry .

After being separated , Harry discovers Alastor 's magical eye has been taken by Dolores . Thinking it a disgrace to Alastor 's memory to keep it stuck in Dolores ' door , Alastor steals the eye , so as to give it a proper burial and the respect it deserves .
Once Harry reunites with Hermione , Alastor witnesses the Muggle-Born Registration Commission , set up to convict Muggle-borns of `` stealing '' magic , at work .
Enraged by what Alastor sees , Harry stuns Dolores and the Death , who is now head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement .
Hermione takes the Horcrux , which Dolores had falsely used to bolster Dolores 's Pure-blood credentials , from Dolores .

By the time Harry and Hermione begin freeing the Muggle-borns , the Ministry knows that there are intruders in the building , having discovered Alastor 's eye missing . Once they reunite with Ronald , they encourage the Muggle-borns to flee the country . They make for the exit , and as they escape , their hiding place is discovered , Ronald is splinched , and they are forced to flee to the countryside , where they move from place to place , never staying anywhere for more than a night or two .
One night , Harry has a vision of Tom interrogating Mykew and realises that Tom is searching for something Mykew once had but which was stolen by a young man long ago .

After several weeks of travelling in which they accomplish nothing , they overhear a conversation between Ted , Dirk Cresswell , Dean , and Goblins Griphook and Gornuk , wherein it is revealed that Godric 's sword , which had been in Albus ' possession and was then sent to the Lestrange for protection , is actually a copy .

They also mention that the whereabouts of the real sword are unknown . Harry , Hermione , and Ronald also overhear that some students attempted to steal the sword from Severus , prior to its removal .
Upon hearing that the perpetrators were their friends , the trio worry about the punishment but are relieved to hear that their friends only served detention with Rubeus .

Harry and Hermione hear all this and are heartened , and after questioning the portrait of Phineas Nigellus Black , they discover that the sword had last been used by Albus on another Horcrux , Marvolo 's ring .
Hermione realises that it must be impregnated with basilisk venom and therefore can destroy Horcruxes .
Ronald is discouraged , feeling that with the sword now necessary as well and out of reach , their quest is becoming hopeless .
He argues with Harry and angrily departs claiming that Hermione had chosen Harry over himself when she decides to stay , leaving Harry and Hermione together
Hermione is distraught upon Ronald 's departure , and Harry is angry , but the two of them realise they will have to continue without Ronald .
After many more listless weeks , they make their way to Godric 's Hollow on the off-chance Albus left the sword there for them , with Bathilda , author of A History of Magic .
Arriving in Godric 's Hollow on Christmas , the two first visit the graveyard where both Harry and Albus ' families are buried .

After sharing an emotional moment and laying a wreath on Harry 's parents ' grave , they visit the memorial to Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley , and then encounter The-Aberforth-Albus-Plot .
Harry and Hermione follow her to her old , disgusting home , where they find a picture frame of Gellert , who is Bathilda 's great-nephew and , long ago , was Albus ' childhood friend .
However , Harry and Hermione do n't realise that the real Bathilda has been killed and her body has been taken over by Tom 's pet and Horcrux .

Only Harry can understand the very little that Bathilda speaks as he can speak Parseltongue , and Nagini is a snake . Bathilda coaxes Harry up the stairs , ordering Hermione to stay behind , in order to ambush Harry . Hermione seems reluctant , but Harry thinks that by following her perhaps she may present him with the Gryffindor sword . Once Harry is upstairs , Bathilda 's body crumbles and Nagini flops out , and begins attacking Harry . Upon leaving , Hermione runs upstairs to help Harry , unfortunately her Blasting Curse rebounds in the chaos and cracks Harry 's wand in two .

As they Apparate , the very second that Tom appears , Harry 's mind begins to flash back to the night in which his lightning scar on his forehead became so , and it reveals exactly how Tom had killed Harry 's parents .

Harry was briefly incapacitated following the incident in Godric 's Hollow , and he and Hermione spend Harry 's few days convalescing in the Forest of Dean where Harry sits down to vindictively read Rita 's book The and Lies of Albus .
He discovers that the boy he saw in Tom 's mind is none other than Gellert and that Albus and he had been good friends as teenagers and had shared the idea that wizards should rule over the Muggles .
Making this discovery , Harry reaches a new level of disillusionment with his former mentor .
While Hermione sleeps , Harry resumes the position of keeping watch outside the tent .
Not long after a silver doe appears . It is obviously a Patronus , due to the silvery texture and appearance .
The doe leads Harry away from the camp site and to a small , frozen lake , where , at the bottom , lies Godric 's Sword .
Harry breaks the ice using Hermione 's wand , strips to his underpants , and attempts to retrieve the sword .

Only when Salazar attempts does Salazar 's locket sense that the sword is near , it wraps itself so tightly around Harry 's neck that it cuts his flesh , keeps him from getting to the surface for air , and begins to both strangle and drown him . Harry tries to make it back to the surface , but he only kicks himself into the rocky and icy part of the pool .
Harry attempts to loosen the locket but his fingers are too frozen .
Harry begins to suffocate , and he feels a pair of arms -LRB- Harry thinks they belong to Death -RRB- wrap around his chest before passing out .
When Harry comes to , he thinks Hermione has come and saved him again , but Hermione has n't -- it 's Ronald !
Ronald was also able to retrieve the sword and cut the locket off of Harry 's neck .
Ronald asks Harry why he did n't take the Horcrux off first , then explains that he 'd been looking for him and Hermione all day .

Ronald also reveals that while running to the pool , he saw something move behind the trees . Harry quickly dresses himself and tells Ronald that since he was the one who got the sword out of the pool , he has to be the one to destroy the Horcrux .
Harry speaks Parseltongue in order for the locket to open and be able to be destroyed .
Tom 's eye appears when it opens and a voice begins speaking to Ronald , teasing him .
From the locket appears two figures : Riddle-Harry , and Riddle-Hermione , who was more beautiful and at the same time more terrible than the real Hermione .
They tease Ronald , all the time Harry is telling Ronald to stab it ; Riddle-Harry saying that Ronald 's mother would rather have had Ronald for a son than Ronald .
Riddle-Hermione saying that nobody would ever look to him when Harry was around .
She then proceeds to wrap her arms around Riddle-Harry .

They kiss romantically , and it is at that moment that Ronald almost fails in both spirit and mind . He overcomes his weakness and smashes it with the sword , and the Horcrux is destroyed . Harry tells Ronald that he has no deep romantic love feelings for Hermione , he loves her like a sister , and that she cried for weeks once he left . They hug and reconcile , and Ronald is there to stay . When they head back to the camp , they awake Hermione to tell her of the good news : The Horcrux was destroyed and Ronald has returned . She , however , does n't seem too happy with Ronald leaving them . She begins to beat him up . Hermione is furious at Ronald for leaving for weeks and then suddenly showing back up . Ronald explains that he wanted to come back as soon as he left but he ran into some Snatchers , whom he tricked into thinking he was Stanley and escaped with an extra wand . He then tells them that early Christmas morning , he heard Harry and Hermione talking through it -LRB- discussing Harry 's broken wand -RRB- . Next , he explains that the Deluminator showed him the way back to them . He tells Harry and Hermione how he saw the silver doe while waiting for someone to show themselves and Harry following it , then explains how he watched Harry jump into the pool and then after a while realised something was wrong and rescued Harry , then grabbed the sword . He and Harry tell her about vanquishing the Horcrux -LRB- though they 're careful about skipping the part where Riddle-Harry and Riddle-Hermione show up -RRB- . In the end , Hermione lets him go and goes to bed without another word , while Harry and Ronald talk about how she could have been worse . Ronald reveals that he was able to find Harry with the aid of Albus 's gift , the Deluminator , which has many more useful abilities than they originally thought . He also reveals that Tom 's name has been `` made Taboo : '' anybody saying it can be traced and located , which is how they were found in the café back on Tottenham Court Road .
Hermione , who has recently been poring over The Tales of Beedle the Bard realises their next necessary step .
She tells them that they need to speak to Xenophilius and ask him about Gellert 's mark , a symbol which has shown up time and again during their journey .
Only days after escaping from Tom in Godric 's Hollow , the trio begin searching the hills surrounding Ottery St Catchpole for the Lovegood residence .
At the Lovegood , Harry , Ronald , and Hermione are told that the symbol actually represents the Deathly Hallows .

Mr then introduces them to The Tale of the Three Brothers , a fairy tale about three men who bested Death and who received a magical item for it : An unbeatable wand -LRB- called the Elder -RRB- , a stone which could bring back the dead -LRB- the Resurrection -RRB- , and an Invisibility Cloak that can hide the wearer from Death itself and never failed with age , unlike most cloaks of that nature . Lovegood tells them that the three items are collectively represented by the symbol , and whoever masters all three artefacts will be the `` Master of Death . ''

Harry believes his own cloak to be the legendary Invisibility Cloak and is very excited . They soon discover that Lovegood has betrayed them to the Ministry ; Luna , his daughter , was taken captive earlier in the year because he was encouraging support for Harry , and he believes that giving them Harry will win her freedom . The trio barely escape from the Death sent to fetch them . In an ingenious plan to ensure escape , but also protect Ronald 's alibi , Hermione throws Harry 's cloak over Ronald and blasts away the floor . When they are sighted by the Death , she guides Harry and Ronald as they Disapparate away . After hearing the story of the Deathly , Harry becomes obsessed with finding them , and he begins to neglect his duties as the group 's leader as he sits in reverie . With Harry not performing , Ronald steps up to lead them as they venture up and down the island checking any place with links to the wizarding world for signs of another Horcrux .

After listless weeks , Ronald finally manages to tune into a rogue wizard radio broadcast called `` Potterwatch , '' run by Lee , which reports the news as it actually happened unlike the Daily Prophet .

The broadcast is quite entertaining , and Harry laughs for the first time in months . However , after the programme , Harry accidentally says Tom 's name , breaking the Taboo , and a group of Snatchers find Harry , Ronald , and Hermione .
Hermione 's quick thinking comes in handy when Hermione uses a jinx to disfigure Harry 's face so he is not immediately recognisable .
They all give false aliases , but the Snatchers soon find out their true identities , albeit a little uncertainty .
Because of their uncertainy , the Snatchers take the trio to Malfoy .
There , they are taken into the drawing room to have their identities confirmed .
Draco-Lucius-Narcissa 's son Draco is home for the Easter holidays .
He is reluctant to identify the trio , but when Lucius is satisfied that the prisoners are indeed Harry and his accomplices , he reaches for his Dark Mark .

At that instant Bellatrix , who was with Draco-Lucius-Narcissa , stops Lucius , because she saw a sword being carried by one of the Snatchers and believes it to be Godric 's Sword which was supposed to be in her vault at Gringotts . She singles out Hermione for torture and interrogation , although Ronald tries and fails to take her place , to find how the trio acquired the sword , while Ronald and Harry are locked in a cellar with Dean , Griphook , Garrick , and Luna .
Hearing Hermione 's cries , Harry locates his broken shard of mirror , sees a flash of blue in it resembling Albus 's eye and in desperation begs for help .
Upstairs , Hermione lies to Bellatrix , saying that the sword is a copy .
Bellatrix sends Draco to fetch Griphook who Harry convinces to corroborate Hermione 's story .
As Draco slams the door , Dobby into the cellar .
Harry orders him to take Dean , Luna and Ollivander first and then return for everyone else .
When Dobby , the noise is heard upstairs , and Peter is sent to investigate .

When he reaches the cellar , Harry and Ronald attack him , but Peter resists , losing his wand to Ronald , but grabbing Harry 's neck with his artificial hand . Harry calls upon the life debt that Peter owes him , and Pettigrew momentarily hesitates , and his artificial hand , made for him by Tom three years previous , immediately strangles Wormtail to death for the mercy he has shown .

At that moment , Hermione lets out a horrible scream of pain . Harry and Ronald leave Peter 's body on the floor and rush upstairs to find Bellatrix questioning Griphook and an unconscious Hermione at her feet .
Griphook tells Bellatrix that the sword is , in fact , a copy .
Bellatrix kicks him aside and presses her Dark Mark . When they crash through the door , Ronald disarms Bellatrix , and he and Harry begin a fierce exchange of spells with the others in the room .
They are forced to stop when Bellatrix threatens to cut Hermione 's throat .
As Tom approaches , Dobby returns and drops a chandelier onto Bellatrix , who drops Hermione and runs away .

The chandelier falls onto the goblin and Hermione and shards of glass fly all over the place . Ronald sprints to pull Hermione from the wreckage as Harry wrests three wands from Draco ; his wand and the wands Ronald and Harry had taken during the earlier skirmish .

Harry picks up Griphook , seizes Dobby and Apparition as Ronald does the same with Hermione . They escape as Tom is close to arriving , but Dobby is struck by Bellatrix 's knife as they flee . They Apparate to Shell , William and Fleur 's house , as Tom makes it to Malfoy . As Ronald takes Hermione inside , Harry sees that Dobby has been struck with Bellatrix 's sharp knife and that he is dying . Dobby dies in Harry 's arms with the final words , `` Harry ... Potter ... '' as Harry is forced to watch helplessly .
As Harry stares at dead Dobby curled up on the grass , he ca n't help but remember staring at Albus 's corpse the same way . William suggests that he bury him .
Harry believes that for Dobby 's bravery , Dobby deserves a funeral just as grand , and Dobby refuses to use magic .
Dobby digs Dobby 's grave by hand as Hermione and Griphook 's injuries are tended to in the house .
While digging the grave , Harry does some thinking .
Dobby realises that Albus had been right about Dobby and Ronald and Pettigrew .
Dobby comes to a reaffirmation of faith in Dobby 's old mentor and loses Dobby 's burning obsession with the Deathly .
Dean takes the injured Griphook inside as William tells Harry that Ronald has taken Hermione inside and that she 'll be alright .
Dean and Ronald come outside . Ronald says to Harry that Hermione is doing better and Fleur is looking after Hermione . Then Dean and Ronald join Harry with digging the grave .
The group holds a funeral for Dobby .
They provide clothes for him ; Harry wraps him in his jacket , Ronald gives him shoes and socks , and Dean gives him a hat .
Luna says a few words for him , as Harry is too grief-stricken to speak .
Ronald and Dean give thanks to Dobby , and Harry manages to choke out a goodbye as he forces himself not to break down .
He asks for some alone time , then finds a large stone and places it , pillowlike , on Dobby 's grave with the epitaph `` HERE LIES Dobby , A FREE ELF . ''
He looks at the grave once more and heads back inside .

Once inside , Harry washes his hands , then tells William he needs to talk to Ollivander and Griphook . He meets up with Ronald and Hermione and then questions Griphook about how to break into Gringotts , believing that a Horcrux is hidden in Bellatrix 's vault .
This feeling was based on her reaction when she saw that the trio had Gryffindor 's Sword .
Harry then questions Ollivander about the Elder , revealing his deep insight into Tom 's way of thinking .
Ollivander also gives him a lesson on wand mechanics ; when a wizard disarms , kills , or otherwise defeats another wizard , they can use that wizard 's wand as well as their own .

Harry tells Ronald and Hermione that Tom is seeking the Elder as the way to defeat him . While telling them this , he receives confirmation as he has a vision in which Tom successfully steals the Elder from the tomb of Albus .

Griphook eventually agrees to help the trio , in return for Gryffindor 's sword . Harry reluctantly concedes that he will have to give up the sword but plans to hand over the sword after all the Horcruxes have been destroyed . He tells Griphook he can have the sword after they have broken in to the Bank , but he is very careful not to mention when , as Goblins are notoriously known for going back on their word .
The trio spend nearly a month planning in one of the Cottages cramped bedrooms , only seeing daylight or the other occupants of the house at mealtimes .
Harry , as well as the other two , comes to strongly dislike Griphook , because the Goblin seems to relish causing pain .
During their stay , Remus visits them again .

Chastened by Harry , he had returned to Nymphadora by Christmas , and he came to Shell to tell everyone that she has given birth to a son who does not have his werewolf tendencies , but instead possesses Nymphadora 's Metamorphmagus abilities .
Remus also gives Harry the honour of being Teddy Lupin 's godfather .
After many rounds of wine , he departs , and as they are cleaning up , William corners Harry and tells him to be wary of Griphook .
After extensive planning , on  May the group sets out for Gringotts to obtain the Horcrux .
Hermione poses by way of Polyjuice as Bellatrix using a lone hair that had been left on her during the Skirmish at Malfoy .
Ronald is disguised as a fictional foreign wizard , and Griphook and Harry go under the Invisibility cloak .
Through their use of disguises and Harry 's repeated use of the Imperius , they manage to gain access to the bank .
As they are travelling down the tunnel to the Lestrange , their cover is blown , and the Gringotts ' defences are set against them .
With Griphook 's help , they gain access to the vault and find the Horcrux , Helga Hufflepuff 's Cup .
Harry grabs it , but Griphook betrays their presence and flees with the sword .

Many guards begin to pour into the vicinity as Harry , Ronald , and Hermione exit the vault . Fighting off the guards , they narrowly escape on the back of a captive half-blind dragon which is released into the wild following their escape .
Gryffindor 's sword is kept by Griphook .

Sitting on the edge of the lake where they dismounted from the dragon , Harry has a vision shortly after their escape in which Tom lists off all the locations of the Horcruxes , now that he realises they are being sought after and destroyed .

Tom inadvertently reveals that the unknown Horcrux , which Harry suspects to be a relic of Rowena Ravenclaw , founder of Ravenclaw house , is safe within Hogwarts , confirming a belief Harry had shared with the others to much derision . Harry realises that if they want to get the Horcrux within Hogwarts , they need to do so immediately , before Tom finds his other Horcruxes are missing .
They immediately Apparate to Hogsmeade to find a way to sneak into the school .
When they arrive in Hogsmeade , they immediately trigger the Caterwauling Charm placed on the village alerting the Death to their presence .
Harry and friends are cornered by the Death , but are saved by Aberforth , Albus 's younger brother .
Harry also discovers that Aberforth was the one he saw in the mirror at Malfoy .
During the ensuing argument , Aberforth urges the trio to flee , but they refuse to give up .
Aberforth then tells them the truth about Ariana ; She had been a witch , but an attack on her by Muggle boys had left her unable to control her natural magical abilities .
Percival attacked the Muggles in retaliation .
Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley kept Ariana and her incurable condition secret to protect her , with Aberforth caring for her the most .
However , one of Ariana 's magical outbursts killed Kendra .
With Aberforth about to return to school , Albus took over care of Ariana .
At this time he was introduced to Gellert . He began to neglect his duties as he was planning his uprising with Gellert , for which he was confronted by Aberforth .
Gellert , Albus , and Aberforth got into a duel , in which Ariana was accidentally killed in the struggle .
After sharing this sad story and being told by Harry that his brother regretted that moment to his death , Aberforth opens a secret passageway to Hogwarts , where Neville greets them .

The trio learn that Neville , Ginevra , and Luna had restarted Albus 's Army to resist the regime of Severus , who was made headmaster following Tom 's takeover of the Ministry and that the members of the reconstituted Albus 's Army have taken shelter in the Room of Requirement to hide from Severus 's forces . Believing that Harry 's return meant revolution , Neville summons members of the D.A. who have been forced to leave the school , including Ginevra , Luna , and Dean , or those who had graduated previously , such as Fred and George , Harry 's old Quidditch team , and his first girlfriend , Cho .
Harry asks them what they know about any artefact that belonged to Ravenclaw , which Albus believed to be a Horcrux .

However , the only known relic is Rowena Ravenclaw 's Diadem , which has been lost for centuries . Wishing to see what the diadem looks like , Harry and Luna venture under Harry 's Invisibility cloak to Ravenclaw .
He reveals himself to get a closer look at the diadem but is seen by Alecto Carrow who had been stationed to watch the room .
She immediately summons Tom , but she is immediately stunned by Luna .
Soon , both Amycus Carrow and Minerva arrive to see what the disturbance is about .
When Carrow suggests that they push the blame off onto the students , Minerva protests , and he spits in her face .
In a rage , Harry uses the Cruciatus Curse on him until he passes out .

Telling her that he is on a mission for Albus , Harry asks Minerva for time to search the castle , but before plans can be made , they come across Severus in the corridor , and in a fierce duel , Severus is run out of the building . Shortly after Harry 's arrival , Tom discovers that two more of his Horcruxes have disappeared and gathers an army of Death , Dementors , and his other supporters , in order to assault the school and kill Harry once and for all . After forcing Severus to flee , Minerva and Kingsley , who only recently arrived , raise their own army consisting of teachers , students , the D.A , the Order of the Phoenix , and enchanted statues and suits of armour .
At midnight , the Battle of Hogwarts begins .

All the while Harry tries to locate the diadem and Ronald and Hermione who had gone missing . Thinking that the diadem had not been seen in living memory , he speaks with the Grey Lady and surmises that Tom had learned of the diadem 's location from her . Shortly after the battle begins , Harry recalls seeing the diadem in the Room of Requirement and meets up with Ronald and Hermione , who had disappeared in order to retrieve Basilisk fangs from the Chamber of Secrets to destroy the next two Horcruxes . The trio re-enter the Room of Requirement , and Ronald remembers all about the house-elves in the kitchens .
He does not feel that it is right to order them to die for them , so he makes his thoughts known .

With a clatter , Hermione drops all the basilisk fangs she is holding , and she and Ronald share a deep , meaningful kiss , completely forgetting that Harry is there and that there is a war going on .

After being reminded , they search the Room of Hidden Things , a version of the Room of Requirement that students have used to hide contraband over the centuries . Once they are inside , they are confronted by Malfoy and his cronies Vincent and Gregory .
During a short duel in which Vincent aims to kill , Vincent mishandles the Fiendfyre spell , causing a huge inferno .
Harry , Ronald , Hermione , Malfoy , and Gregory escape on two old brooms , and the diadem is destroyed by the fire , along with Vincent .

Soon after , Fred and Percy , who had just reconciled with Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley , are seen duelling with two Death one of whom is Minister for Magic Pius Thicknesse . After they defeat them , there is an explosion in the corridor , and Fred is killed , deeply affecting his parents , sister and brothers , as well as Harry and Hermione .
With the cup and diadem destroyed , only one Horcrux remains Tom 's snake , Nagini .
The trio fight their way through the castle , as the two armies battle furiously , dodging curses , Death , and Acromantulas and saving Draco 's life again along the way .
When they reach the Entrance Hall , they find that Giants have joined the battle .
Before leaving Hermione spots Fenrir trying to attack Lavender on a balcony and casts a spell that knocks them off .

While Lavender stirs feebly , Fenrir tries to get up but Sybill drops a Crystal ball on his head and he is knocked unconscious . It is presumed that Lavender dies later . Trelawney then grabs another Crystal ball and uses her wand to throw one with a `` tennis like serve '' .
Once onto the grounds , they come across Tom 's Dementors .
Unable to produce Patronuses , because of the horrors they have witnessed , all seems lost , and Harry even welcomes the oblivion that accompanies the Dementor 's Kiss .
They are saved by Seamus , Luna , and Ernie , who conjure Patronuses long enough for Harry to summon the will to drive Dementor away .
Then Seamus , Luna , and Ernie run to safety .

Harry , Hermione , and Ronald finally make it to the Shrieking , where Tom is waiting out the battle . They discover him talking to Severus , who wishes to participate in the battle to find Harry , but Tom 's only concern is that the Elder does not seem to work properly for him . He coldly sets his snake on Severus , believing that the wand can not serve him while Snape is still alive , as Severus had killed Albus .
As he dies , Harry runs out to him , and Severus gives up his memories to Harry , and his last request was to look into Harry 's eyes who has the same eyes as his mother Lily .
Tom then delivers an ultimatum ; if Harry does not surrender himself in an hour , he will join the battle , and all in Hogwarts will be destroyed .
Returning to the castle , Harry sees the defenders looking for loved ones and counting up the dead , with Lupin and Nymphadora laying next to Colin and Fred .
After seeing this , Harry makes his way up to Albus 's office to view the memories Severus left him .
Harry dives into Severus 's memories , learning several surprising secrets .

Severus and Lily were friends as children , back when Lily was first discovering her magical powers . The two remained close friends through school , even after Lily was sorted into Gryffindor and Severus was sorted into Slytherin , until the day Severus angrily called Lily a mudblood while being teased by James and Sirius .

This ended their friendship permanently , as Lily refused to accept Severus 's many apologies despite his total regret and remorse leading to him joining the Death . After overhearing the prophecy involving Harry and Tom and reporting it to the Dark Lord , Severus was horrified when Lily was targeted and went to Albus begging him to keep Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra safe .

Albus agreed on the condition Severus promised his total allegiance to him , however even he could n't protect them due to their poor judgement in making Wormtail their Secret Keeper . Afterwards , Albus knew the day would come Tom would return and Snape promised to protect Harry no matter what in Lily 's memory , which he did throughout his time at the school despite the boy reminding Severus of James and the risk to his life if Tom or the Death Eaters should find out . Upon Tom 's return , Albus sent Severus to return to the Death 's ranks to act as a double agent for him . Harry then finds out that , prior to his sixth year , Albus had put on the ring in a foolish attempt to see Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley only to fall victim to a curse which , despite Severus 's efforts , would kill him within a year . Albus then tells Severus to do what he could to protect Draco and , knowing that Tom had ordered the boy to kill the headmaster , to take over the task . As well as preventing damage to Draco 's soul from committing a murder , Draco would also be sparing Albus from a painful death .

Albus then explains why Harry is so important ; when Tom 's body was destroyed , a piece of Tom 's soul latched onto the baby since Tom was closest living thing -LRB- explaining why Harry can speak Parseltongue -RRB- .
In effect , Harry Tom is a horcrux and must be killed by Tom personally to destroy that part of Tom 's soul .

Severus is horrified that they have essentially been preparing Harry to die at the proper time , and when Albus notes that despite everything Snape does truly care for Harry , Severus summons his Patronus which is a doe ... his love for Lily being so strong , his patronus changed to be the same as hers -LRB- as well as revealing that it was Severus who led Harry to the Sword of Gryffindor in the lake -RRB- .
Harry emerges from the memories , now knowing that Severus was always working for Albus against Tom and that he must die to destroy the Dark Lord forever .
Resigned to his fate , Harry sneaks out of the castle under his Invisibility cloak and stops to tell Neville to kill Nagini , the other remaining Horcrux , at all costs .
Then , before he sacrifices himself to Tom , he opens the Golden left to him by Albus to reveal the Resurrection .
He uses it to summon the spirits of his parents , of Sirius , and of Remus , all of whom provide emotional support as Harry walks to his death .

He enters Tom 's camp and shows himself . He tries to betray fear as he allows himself to be hit with the Killing Curse . However , Harry finds himself in a sort of dream and meets the deceased Albus in what appears to be a deserted King 's Cross Station .
He appears to be in a Limbo state in which he can speak to Albus . Here , it is explained he can not be killed by Tom whilst Tom lives .
Since Tom used Harry 's blood to recreate his body , Lily 's protection over Harry binds the two and therefore tethers Harry to life .

Albus then gives Harry a theory on why his wand acted of its own accord : as a result of their encounter in the Little Hangleton graveyard three years previous , Harry 's wand was imbued with some of the qualities of Tom 's wand and regurgitated some of his own magic back at him .

He also discovers that the part of Tom 's soul he had had inside himself has been separated by the attempted murder and is represented in his vision by a flayed naked child , whimpering in agony and abandoned under a bench , which is Tom .

Albus confides in Harry that he had sought the Hallows , with Gellert , for less than noble reasons and that the death of his sister resulted from their association . In Albus 's opinion , only Harry is worthy of possessing the Hallows . With all of his secrets in the open , Harry can no longer find himself angry with Albus even after all he has been through . Harry is given the choice of moving on or returning to try to stop Tom . Harry chooses to return to life and fight back . Back in the forest , Tom appears to have collapsed at the same time Harry did . Fearing not all went according to plan , he orders Narcissa to check and see if Harry is dead , and after being subtly notified that her son , Draco , is alive and well inside Hogwarts , she tells Tom and the Death Eaters that Harry is indeed dead , so that she may enter the castle and find him .

Tom then attempts to desecrate Harry 's `` corpse '' by casting the Cruciatus Curse on it multiple times , but Harry feels no pain from these curses . Afterwards , Tom orders Rubeus to carry Harry back to Hogwarts during the Death victory march . Tom then challenges Hogwarts to surrender but is faced down by Neville . Tom proceeds to torture Neville by summoning the Sorting Hat , placing it on his head , and setting it aflame .
At that moment , Hogwarts reinforcements appear near the school boundaries and run toward the school , the centaurs join the side of Hogwarts in the battle , and the battle recommences .
In the confusion , Harry covers himself with the Invisibility Cloak .
Nagini , the last Horcrux , is beheaded by Neville using Gryffindor 's sword , pulled from the Sorting Hat in part for his bravery .

Harry fights his way into the Great casting curses and protective spells from underneath his cloak , where a huge battle is taking place as Hogwarts fighters , Albus 's Army , the Order of the Phoenix , and other forces battle the remnants of Tom 's army .
Eventually , All the Death Eaters are either killed or defeated with just Tom and Bellatrix left standing .

Tom duels Minerva , his old mentor Horace , and Kingsley , while nearby Bellatrix battles Ginevra , Luna , and Hermione . After Ginevra narrowly avoids a Killing Curse , her mother takes over and brutally kills Bellatrix in a duel .

In his deep fury and anger , Tom tries to kill Mrs , but Harry reveals himself by casting a Shield Charm to protect her . Coming face-to-face with Tom in the Great , Harry is seemingly faced with impossible odds -- Tom possesses the Elder and has murdered who he thought to be its previous master , Severus .

Harry believes differently based on the information he received from Ollivander ; as Harry sees it , Draco became the true master of the Elder when he disarmed Albus against his will , therefore , defeating him .
Since Harry had taken Malfoy 's wand at Malfoy , full mastery and control of the wand then passed to Harry , not Tom .

The two debate this point among the verbal barbs they trade , with Harry revealing that Albus also asked Severus to kill Severus if necessary to prevent anyone else from defeating Severus and having the Elder 's power die with Severus , but that was prevented by Draco disarming Severus . Harry also attempts to save Tom , who Severus is calling by Severus 's given name , Tom , from Severus by telling Severus to feel some remorse for all Severus had done .

This shocks Tom more than anything Harry has ever said to Severus up to this point . Harry explains all of this to Tom , who chooses not to believe him . Just as the sun breaks the horizon , Tom attacks Harry .
When Tom 's Killing Curse from the Elder strikes Harry 's Disarming , the Elder Wand flies out of Tom 's hand into Harry 's hand and the Killing Curse is directed towards Tom .
Harry 's theory has been proven correct -- the Elder refuses to kill Harry 's true master .
Tom is bereft of all his Horcruxes , but since his soul is irreparably broken because of the Horcruxes themselves , he does not actually die .
He is gone , completely vanquished of power and life , but stuck in the limbo stage between life and death for all eternity .
In the wake of the battle , major changes begin to occur in the Wizarding world .
Kingsley is appointed interim Minister for Magic and the Death Eaters are fleeing for their lives .
Harry takes the time to explain to Ronald and Hermione everything that happened as they walk to the Headmaster 's office .

Harry is now master of all three Deathly Hallows but chooses to leave the Resurrection lost in the forest where he dropped it , and plans to return the Elder to Albus 's tomb in the hope that when he dies its tremendous power will be broken , although not before he uses it successfully fully repair his own holly and phoenix feather wand .
Albus 's portrait applauds his decision .
